Mario is Decked Out for the Spooky Season in New Odyssey Update
Related Article
paragraph:
As you can see in the above pic, Mario is more than ready for Halloween thanks to a new Super Mario Odyssey outfit. Nintendo released an update for the platformer, which adds the Zombie Mario costume to the post-game and introduces three new Snapshot Mode filters. The fresh filters are Kaleidoscope, Tile, and Manga.   -------Joseph Luster is the Games and Web editor at Otaku USA Magazine.
